list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a line or ridge produced on paper or cloth by folding, pressing, or crushing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khaki quần có nếp nhăn cạnh dao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of a number of lines marked on the pitch at specified places, especially the position of a batsman.
an area around the goal in ice hockey or lacrosse that attacking players may not normally enter unless the puck or ball has already done so.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was caught in the crease without the puck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta bị bắt trong nếp nhăn mà không có puck

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a crease in (cloth or paper).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he sank into the chair, careful not to crease his dinner jacket
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh chìm xuống ghế, cẩn thận đừng làm nhăn áo khoác ăn tối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a bullet) graze (someone or something), causing little damage.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một viên đạn nhăn đùi của mình
